short_description: The challenge for this round is to make a track with percussion instruments only.
long_description: No pain, no gain.  No hit, no win.  No percussion, no participation!  The challenge for this round is **make a track with percusion instruments only**.  The instruments may be accoustic, electronic or digital but must be percussions, or percussion like.  If what is or not percussion is not clear you may refer to the following wikipedia article https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percussion_instrument.  You can use any plugin, any effect and any DAW as long as they are **free and open source**.  You can also record live performances and use any properly licensed sample.  Now go make a smashing hit using only percussions.  *Happy music making!*
